question.body: Which renal functions are the ureters involved with?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The exchange with the blood to remove toxins only occurs in the kidney.
Correct. Ureters are part of the elimination process since they move urine from the kidneys.
Incorrect. The exchange with the blood to remove toxins only occurs in the kidney.
Incorrect. We donâ€™t urinate directly from our ureters, but they are necessary for the process of elimination
